title: Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn RE:0096
synopsis: By the year 0096 of the Universal Century, a fragile peace emerges from the ashes of conflict. Sixteen-year-old student Banagher Links visits the Industrial 7 space colony on a school field trip, but because of a broken shuttle, he is left completely stranded.
related_anime: ['Kidou Senshi Gundam Unicorn', 'Re:I Am', 'Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn']
